description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. You play as Rick Rescue.  The last surving man on the planet, after the alien attack that left a barren waste land.  The aliens have gone, but not before imprisoning the remaining women and leaving robots to guard them.   Can Rick Rescue save the girls and save the world?
description.short: You play as Rick Rescue.  The last surving man on the planet, after the alien attack that left a barren waste land.  The aliens have gone, but not before imprisoning the remaining women and leaving robots to guard them.   Can Rick Rescue save the girls and save the world?
